|highly recommend it!

|more about the Lullaby, you'll want to talk|to the guild staff... If you've made up your|mind to become a wizard, please contact our|
|guild master, Master Yubia...

174.<if_saihou>「よう 調子はどうだい？| できのいい装備品が 作れたら|:
Hey, how's it going? When you've made a good|piece of equipment, you can sell it at the|Traveler's Bazaar. The higher your level and|
|the better your equipment, the better your|reputation. It would be nice if they wore the|clothes you made for them.At first, I thought the dice were for|weaklings... Cloaks and helmets are much|cooler! But clothes and robes made by top-|
|notch craftsmen can have better protection|than armor made by blacksmiths. I've become|obsessed with the allure of a weapon that|
|combines strength and ease of movement with|beauty...

175.<if_kazi>「銅の鍛冶ハンマーばかり 使ってたら| それじゃ デキのいいア:
If you only use copper hammers, people will|say you can't make good items with them. If|you use a more expensive hammer, the strength|
|of each hit won't change, but you'll get|better accuracy. To improve the quality of|your work, it's important to have a good|
|attack. But a good hammer is expensive...This is for blacksmithing... If you go to the|guild headquarters and become a blacksmith,|you'll be able to make items here... There|
|are various types of blacksmithing... What|I'm doing is making weapons. Weapons. There's|a guild headquarters at Castle Glenn.

177.<if_saihou>「高価な さいほう針を使っても| １回で ぬえる強さは 変:
Even if you use an expensive sewing needle,|it won't change the strength of the blow, but|it will make it easier to get a satisfying|
|response. The key to making a good product is|to get a good response...Do you like it? Clothes and hats can be worn|in many professions, and they make great|gifts for friends. A craftsman can change as|
|many times as he wants until he becomes a|full-fledged craftsman, so it's a good idea|to give it a try...

178.<if_saihou>「さいほうをしてると レシピによって| 次に ぬう時に必要:
When you're working on a recipe, the amount|of concentration needed to make the next one|changes depending on the recipe, right? In|
|fact, when more concentration is required,|the chance of getting a satisfying response|increases dramatically, so it's a good chance|
|to make a good product...Hey, you... This is where we do our|rehearsals. We make clothes, robes, hats...|If you're interested in becoming a magician,|
|please visit the magic guild headquarters in|the town of Juliet... Please...

179.<if_ranpu>「ちゅいーっす。調子はどうだーい？| 失敗ばっかりで 超バッ:
Tsk, tsk, tsk. How are you doing? When the|wind is blowing so badly that you're|constantly failing, it's time to change your|
|mood. My favorite way to change your mood is|to yell "Spinny!" when you start the roulette|wheel. when starting the roulette wheel? This|
|is quite effective... The roulette goddess|will turn her back on you if you keep|spinning with a stern face.Oh, what? You're interested? This is a|facility for lamp smiths to work... Lamp|smiths are exciting craftsmen who can add|
|magical effects to equipment to enhance it...|If you've always wanted to be a lamp smith,|you should go to the guild headquarters on|
|the recreational island of Raqqaran.

180.<if_mokkou>「……ハァ ハァッ……！| 木工の レシピによっては……削:
... Huh, huh, huh...! Some woodworking|recipes... Some of the wood burns when it's|cut, causing the wood to cut more than|

|Huh. Huh!... Huh, huh...! This is... Equipment for|woodworking. We're mainly making weapons out|of wood. I'm making. If you are interested in|
|woodworking... If you're interested in|woodworking, you can go to Kamikarmui, the|capital of Eltona. There is the headquarters|
|of the Woodworkers Guild. Huh...

181.「ここのギルドは 今は運営してないの。| また 出なおしてね。: This guild is no longer in operation... Let's|go again.

|throne room... Do you know how important|weapon smithing is to this country?

184.<if_kazi>「おっ あんたも鍛冶職人だな。| ギルドだけじゃなく ここでも:

|don't know the specifics, but it's worth it|to us to support him! Please accept this!

|completed the same quest multiple times, you|will only receive one reward.

192.「たいくつー たいくつー。| サーカスみれなくて たいくつー。|<br>|「ん？: I'm so tired... I can't see the circus...|Hmm? If it's the entrance to the circus, the|door to the left here is...

193.「たいくつー たいくつー。| サーカス観れなくて たいくつー。|<br>|「ん？: I'm so tired... I can't wait to see the|circus. Hmm? If it's the entrance to the|circus, the door to the left here is...

194.「こちらは 当国公認チーム専用の| 購買部……ですが すみません| まだ 準備中:
This is the purchasing department for our|official teams. I'm sorry, but we're still in|the process of preparing... We have some|
|special items that you can't buy anywhere|else, so please be patient...

195.「こちらは愛と信頼の 預かり所。| 皆さまの 大切な持ち物と ゴールドを| 無料:
This is a deposit of love and trust... This|is the bank of love and trust... where we|keep your belongings and your gold, free of|
|charge. When you deposit your gold in the|Gold Bank, you can travel with peace of mind|knowing that your money will never be lost,|
|even when you run out of energy. That's|why...

196.「とほほ……。わたくしとしたことが……。| こんな所に 閉じ込められている場合で:
Oh, my... I'm sorry... I'm not supposed to be|locked up in here. I was searching for all|the little medals in the world on my master's|
|orders, and I got carried away and took them|from someone's wardrobe, and here I am...|Oh... Oh, you're my master? He's Mr. Gorlek,|
|owner of the South Sea island of Lackalang...|I don't know what he uses them for, but he|collects small medals, and he's known as the|
|"medal owner. ... Oh, yes, the traveler!|Hmm... Who are you? Since I'm unfortunately trapped,|I was wondering if you could find a small|medal for me... Of course not for free! In|
|exchange for the medal, I'll trade you my|most prized possession. All you have to do is|bring me a certain number of small medals and|
|I'll exchange them for the item as often as|you like! However, since the Zoomstone is a|popular item, we can only accept one per|
|person... That's why...

197.「ここは 調理ギルド本部だよ！| でも 今はまだ 運営してないんだ……。|<br:
This is the cooking guild headquarters! But|we're not running it right now... When the|cooking guild starts working, you'll be able|
|to smell it all over town. Look forward to|it!

198.「ここは 調理ギルド本部だよ！| でも 今はまだ 運営してないんだ……。|<br:
This is the cooking guild headquarters! But|we're not running it right now... When the|cooking guild starts working, you'll be able|
|to smell it all over town. Look forward to|it!

199.「聞いてください！| ついに 長年の夢だった| 自分の店を持つことが できたんで:
Please listen to me! I finally got to do what|I've dreamed of for so long... own my own|store! But... But then I realized I still had|
|no idea what I'd be selling... I've been|feeling sad, so I've been arranging all the|junk in my house like this, but it's making|
|me feel even sadder...

200.「ふふふ……。どうだい 立派だろう。| この町が もっと賑やかになればと思って|:
Mmm-hmm... How do you like it? I've decided|to open a store in this prime location,|hoping to make this town more lively... What?|
|What kind of store will I open? Well, you|see... I did a thorough market research to|find a profitable business...

202.「ここは オーグリード旅人バザー。| 冒険者同士で 商品の売り買いができる| 施:
This is the Aughrid Traveller... It's a place|where adventurers can buy and sell their|wares, but... It's still being set up. I'm|
|sure we'll be able to open for business when|we get to Glenn, so please wait a little|longer...

203.「……ですが 今は 持ちきれないようですね。| つかうものと そうびひんを 整理: ... But I don't think I can take it right|now. Please come back later and sort out your|belongings and personal effects.<bw_break>

204.「コロシアムでの戦いが 熱く盛り上がってくると| いずれは 観戦だけをしたい と:
As the battles at the Colosseum heat up, I'm|sure there will be customers who just want to|watch... For those customers, I'm trying to|
|find out what kind of fights are going on and|prepare to watch them...

205.「あっ お客様！| 観戦席は まだ準備中ですので| 立ち入りは ご遠慮ください。: Sir! The bleachers are still being prepared,|so please refrain from entering.

206.「コロシアムは ただ今 準備中です。| 手に汗にぎる 熱い対戦を待ち望む| 冒険: The Colosseum is now in preparation... I'm|working hard for the adventurers who are|waiting for a sweaty, hot match!

207.「困ったわ……。| せっかく お店を まかされたのに| 品物が まだ届かないんで:
Oh my god... I've been put in charge of the|store, but the goods haven't arrived yet... I|apologize for the inconvenience, but it's|
|going to take a while.

208.「アクセサリーは| 他の冒険者と 売ったり 買ったり| 取り引き できないのです: Accessories cannot be sold or bought by other|adventurers. It's something you have to|collect with your own strength. Good luck...
